name: Kolcha-e-Khatayi
description: Cardamom-almond cookie with a crisp shell and soft centre, baked for celebrations.
recipe: Flour, sugar, butter, cardamom, ground almonds; shape and bake at 180 °C until golden.

name: Afghan Jalebi
description: Crisp saffron-rose-water fritter soaked in fragrant sugar syrup.
recipe: Yeast batter piped into hot oil, fried till golden, then dunked in cardamom-saffron syrup.

name: Ghorabiye
description: Iranian almond macaroon, light and chewy, topped with a pistachio sliver.
recipe: Almond flour, egg white, sugar, vanilla; bake low and slow.

name: Reshteh Khoshkar
description: Crispy deep-fried ribbon shaped from rice-flour dough scented with cardamom & cinnamon.
recipe: Rice flour, sugar, spices, walnut; press in mould, fry, dust with icing sugar.

name: Nan-e Berenji
description: Delicate rice-flour cookie flavoured with rose water and poppy seeds.
recipe: Rice flour, butter, sugar, rose water; chill dough, stamp with mould, bake.

name: Biscotti di Prato
description: Twice-baked almond oblongs meant for dunking in Vin Santo.
recipe: Flour, sugar, eggs, almonds; bake loaf, slice, bake again until dry.

name: Amaretti di Saronno
description: Crisp-chewy macaroon with a bitter-almond perfume, wrapped in colourful paper.
recipe: Apricot-kernel flour, egg white, sugar; pipe small mounds, dust with icing sugar, bake.

name: Baci di Dama
description: Piedmont hazelnut sandwich cookies glued with dark-chocolate ganache.
recipe: Roasted hazelnuts, butter, flour, sugar; bake hemispheres, join with chocolate.

name: Ricciarelli
description: Soft almond paste biscuit from Siena, crackled surface dusted with snowy icing sugar.
recipe: Almond meal, egg white, honey, orange zest; rest dough overnight, bake at 160 °C.

name: Pizzelle
description: Waffle-pattern wafer flavoured with anise or vanilla, made on a hot iron.
recipe: Eggs, sugar, flour, butter, anise; ladle onto pizzelle iron, cook 30 s.

name: Macaron
description: Colourful meringue sandwich with ganache or butter-cream filling.
recipe: Aged egg whites, almond flour, icing sugar; macaronage, pipe, rest, bake, fill.

name: Sablé
description: Buttery shortbread from Normandy with a sandy, melt-in-mouth texture.
recipe: Flour, butter, sugar, egg yolk; roll, cut, bake 12 min at 170 °C.

name: Palets Bretons
description: Thick salted-butter biscuit, golden and crumbly.
recipe: Flour, salted butter, sugar, egg yolk, baking powder; refrigerate, cut rounds, bake.

name: Financier
description: Small rectangular almond cake cookie, moist inside, crisp edges.
recipe: Beurre noisette, almond flour, icing sugar, egg whites, flour; bake in rectangular moulds.

name: Langues de Chat
description: Thin, crisp cat-tongue shaped biscuits perfect with tea or ice-cream.
recipe: Butter, sugar, egg whites, flour; pipe 8 cm strips, bake pale gold.

name: Petit Beurre
description: The famous scallop-edged butter biscuit from Nantes, stamped with the hour 18:00.
recipe: Flour, sugar, butter, milk, baking powder; dock, chill, bake.

name: Speculoos
description: Spiced caramelised shortcrust traditionally served with coffee.
recipe: Flour, brown sugar, butter, cinnamon, cloves; roll thin, stamp windmill, bake.

name: Madeleine
description: Shell-shaped sponge cake-cookie, light with browned butter note.
recipe: Eggs, sugar, flour, browned butter, lemon zest; rest batter, pipe shell mould, bake.

name: Anzac Biscuit
description: Chewy oat-coconut biscuit originally sent to ANZAC soldiers.
recipe: Rolled oats, flour, coconut, golden syrup, butter, bicarb; bake 15 min.

name: Chocolate-Chip Cookie
description: Classic drop cookie studded with semi-sweet chocolate chips.
recipe: Cream butter & sugars, add eggs, vanilla, flour, chips; scoop, bake 10-12 min.

name: Snickerdoodle
description: Soft sugar cookie rolled in cinnamon-sugar before baking.
recipe: Butter, sugar, eggs, flour, cream of tartar; roll in cinnamon sugar, bake.

name: Peanut-Butter Blossom
description: Peanut-butter cookie topped with a Hershey’s Kiss pressed in while warm.
recipe: PB, sugar, egg, flour; bake, press kiss, cool.

name: Shortbread
description: Rich buttery biscuit made of just sugar, butter, flour in 1:2:3 ratio.
recipe: Cream butter & sugar, add flour, pat into tin, bake low 30 min, cut while warm.

name: Gingerbread Man
description: Spiced molasses cookie cut into human shapes and decorated.
recipe: Flour, butter, brown sugar, molasses, ginger, cloves; chill, cut, bake, pipe icing.

name: Bourbon Cream
description: Oblong chocolate sandwich biscuit with chocolate fondant filling.
recipe: Cocoa biscuit dough, cut rectangles, bake, sandwich with fondant.

name: Digestive
description: Semi-sweet wholemeal biscuit, good with cheese or chocolate coating.
recipe: Whole-wheat flour, butter, sugar, malt extract, baking soda; dock, bake.

name: Hobnob
description: Oaty crunchy biscuit often half-dipped in chocolate.
recipe: Rolled oats, flour, butter, golden syrup; rough texture, bake till golden.

name: Jammie Dodger
description: Shortbread sandwich with a sticky raspberry jam centre and heart cut-out.
recipe: Cut two rounds, stamp hole in one, bake, glue with jam, dust with sugar.

name: Florentine
description: Thin disc of caramelised nuts & fruit, back-coated with chocolate.
recipe: Almonds, candied peel, honey, cream; cook, spread, cut circles, coat bottom with chocolate.

name: Cavallucci
description: Chewy Tuscan cookie with honey, anise, coriander, candied fruit.
recipe: Melt honey & sugar, add spices, nuts, flour; shape balls, bake low.

name: Brutti-ma-Buoni
description: Meringue-hazelnut drops, crispy outside, soft inside – ‘ugly but good’.
recipe: Hazelnuts, egg white, sugar; pipe small mounds, bake 30 min at 160 °C.

name: Cantucci
description: Variant of biscotti with whole almonds, traditionally dunked in Vin Santo.
recipe: Same as biscotti but with whole almonds, sliced thicker.

name: Ghoriba
description: Soft round semolina cookie with generous butter and orange-blossom notes.
recipe: Semolina, butter, sugar, orange water; rest dough, shape, press thumb, bake.

name: Ma‘amoul
description: Short-pastry filled with dates or nuts, moulded into decorative shapes.
recipe: Semolina dough, butter, mahleb; fill with date paste, press into wooden mould, bake, dust.

name: Kourabiedes
description: Buttery almond shortbread crescents buried under a snowdrift of icing sugar.
recipe: Butter, flour, roasted almonds, ouzo; bake, cool, roll in icing sugar.

name: Melomakarona
description: Spiced honey cookie soaked in syrup and topped with walnuts.
recipe: Flour, oil, orange zest, cinnamon; bake, drench in honey syrup, sprinkle nuts.

name: Alfajor
description: Two soft biscuits glued with dulce de leche and rolled in coconut.
recipe: Corn-starch shortbread, sandwich with DDL, coat desiccated coconut.

name: Polvorón
description: Crumbly lard-and-almond shortbread traditionally eaten at Christmas.
recipe: Flour toasted dry, pork lard, icing sugar, ground almonds; wrap in paper, press, bake.

name: Pfeffernüsse
description: Small round spice cookies glazed with sugar, heavy on cloves and white pepper.
recipe: Flour, honey, anise, cinnamon, pepper, nuts; chill, roll balls, bake, glaze.

name: Lebkuchen
description: Soft gingerbread-like cookie with nuts, candied citrus, often iced.
recipe: Honey dough, rye flour, almonds, orange peel; bake on oblaten, brush sugar glaze.

name: Speculaas
description: Windmill-shaped caramel cookie fragrant with cinnamon, cloves, nutmeg.
recipe: Brown sugar, butter, speculaas spice; press into mould, bake till browned.

name: Stroopwafel
description: Thin wafer cookie sliced and sandwiched with treacly caramel syrup.
recipe: Yeast waffle batter, bake thin, slice hot, spread caramel, press together.

name: Basler Läckerli
description: Hard honey-almond-citrus bar cookie glazed with sugar, Basel specialty.
recipe: Honey, sugar, almonds, candied peel, Kirsch; roll, cut while hot, glaze.

name: Vanillekipferl
description: Crescent-shaped vanilla shortbread rolled in vanilla sugar while warm.
recipe: Ground hazelnuts, flour, butter, vanilla sugar; shape crescents, bake, coat.

name: Lusikkaleivät
description: Spoon-shaped oat cookies sandwiched with berry jam and dipped in sugar.
recipe: Press soft dough into spoon, bake, join with jam, roll in sugar.

name: Berliner Brot
description: Chocolate-glazed spiced shortbread with crunchy sugar nibs on top.
recipe: Flour, butter, sugar, cinnamon, cloves; cut rectangles, bake, coat chocolate, sprinkle nib sugar.

name: Mitaee
description: ??Chocolate-glazed spiced shortbread with crunchy sugar nibs on top.
recipe: ??Flour, butter, sugar, cinnamon, cloves; cut rectangles, bake, coat chocolate, sprinkle nib sugar.

name: Shir-parre
description: ??Chocolate-glazed spiced shortbread with crunchy sugar nibs on top.
recipe: ??Flour, butter, sugar, cinnamon, cloves; cut rectangles, bake, coat chocolate, sprinkle nib sugar.
